mapper.insert: insert into tp_question(question, answer, item1, item2, item3, item4, explains, url, category_id, subject, type, create_time, update_time) values(#{question}, #{answer}, #{item1}, #{item2}, #{item3}, #{item4}, #{explains}, #{url}, #{categoryId}, #{subject}, #{type}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update:
update tp_question
question = #{question},
answer = #{answer},
item1 = #{item1},
item2 = #{item2},
item3 = #{item3},
item4 = #{item4},
explains = #{explains},
url = #{url},
category_id = #{categoryId},
subject = #{subject},
type = #{type},
update_time = #{updateTime}
id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from tp_question order by create_time
select q.*, c.name category_name from tp_question q left join tp_category c on q.category_id = c.id where q.id = #{id}
